review.title: “Poor Management”
review.pros: Pros – Coworkers were great to work with. The pay was good for the position. Relaxed, casual environment-there was never anyone around to "manage". As long as your work was done that was all that mattered.
review.cons: Cons – Very poor management. Could go days without seeing or hearing from management. Would often get yelled at for things out of our control.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Unfortunately it is already too late for this company! They are already out of business!! They needed to pay more attention to what was happening on a daily basis.
